column2: Most righteous [Root.GetTitledFirstName], I have a humble request for you in light of your debt to us. There is no rest in our defense against the infidel and we have desperate need of knights to lead our men. Thus, I would like to extend this opportunity to your able and noble [FromFrom.GetSonDaughter] [FromFrom.GetFirstName] to serve in our ranks. Naturally, this would disinherit [FromFrom.GetHerHim]. May [From.Religion.GetHighGodName] bless you,\n\n[From.GetTitledFirstName]
column3:
Très juste [Root.GetTitledFirstName], j'ai une humble requête à vous soumettre, qui a trait à votre dette envers l'Ordre.

Comme vous le savez, notre lutte contre les infidèles ne connaît aucun répit et nous avons grand besoin de chevaliers. Nous présentons donc l'opportunité à votre fils [FromFrom.GetFirstName] de servir dans nos rangs afin de rembourser votre emprunt. Notez cependant que cet engagement le déshériterait.

Grand Maître [From.GetFirstName]
column4: Rechtschaffenste[Root.GetrMale] [Root.GetTitledFirstName], ich habe eine bescheidende Bitte an euch angesichts eurer Schulden an uns. Unsere Verteidigung gegen die Ungläubigen hat keine Ruhe und wir brauchen dringend Ritter, um unsere Männer anzuführen. Ich möchte diese Gelegenheit daher nutzen, um euren fähigen und edlen Sohn [FromFrom.GetFirstName] anzufordern, um in unseren Reihen zu dienen. Natürlich würde dies ihn enterben. Möge [From.Religion.GetHighGodName] euch segnen,\n\nGroßmeister [From.GetFirstName]
column6: Just[Root.GetOA] [Root.GetTitleFirstName]. Quisiera haceros una humilde petición respecto a la deuda que tenéis que nosotros. La lucha contra el infiel no descansa y estamos muy necesitados de caballeros que dirijan a nuestros hombres. Así pues, me gustaría extender la invitación a servir en nuestras filas a vuestro a capaz y noble hijo [FromFrom.GetFirstName]. Por supuesto, esto le desheredaría. Que [From.Religion.GetHighGodName] os bendiga.\n\nGran Maestre [From.GetFirstName]

column2:
To [Root.GetTitledName],
We have heard your passionate plea for forgiveness, and We are certain that you will be eager to prove the sincerity of your repentance by devoting the life of your [son_monk_candidate.GetSonDaughter] [son_monk_candidate.GetFirstName] to [From.Religion.GetHighGodName].

Sincerely,
[From.GetTitledName]
column3:
[Root.Get_Au_TitledName],
Nous avons pris note de votre plaidoyer véhément pour le pardon et Nous sommes certain que vous aurez hâte de prouver la sincérité de votre repentance en vouant la vie d'un de vos enfants [From.Get_au_HighGod].

Cordialement,
[From.GetTitledName]
column4:
An [Root.GetTitledName],
Wir haben eure leidenschaftliche Bitte um Vergebung zur Kenntnis genommen und sind sicher, dass ihr die Aufrichtigkeit eurer Reue beweisen werdet, indem ihr eines eurer Kinder dem Leben von [From.Religion.GetHighGodName] widmet.

Hochachtungsvoll,
[From.GetTitledName]
column6:
A [Root.GetTitledName], 
Hemos escuchado tu apasionada petición de perdón y Nos estamos seguros que desearás mostrar la sinceridad de tu arrepentimiento dedicando la vida de uno de tus hijos a [From.Religion.GetHighGodName].

Atentamente, 
[From.GetTitledName]

column2:
To [Root.GetTitledName],
We have heard your passionate plea for forgiveness, and We are certain that you will be eager to prove the sincerity of your repentance by devoting the life of your [son_monk_candidate.GetSonDaughter] [son_monk_candidate.GetFirstName] to defence of the [From.Religion.GetHighGodName] as a member of.

Sincerely,
[From.GetTitledName]

The [FromFrom.GetTitle] has determined that the price for my wickedness is the life of my [son_monk_candidate.GetSonDaughter] [son_monk_candidate.GetFirstName]. [son_monk_candidate.GetSheHeCap] will take [son_monk_candidate.GetHerHis] leave [Root.Capital.GetName] to become a [son_monk_candidate.GetManWoman] of the faith.

The [FromFrom.GetTitle] has determined that the price for my wickedness is the life of my [son_monk_candidate.GetSonDaughter] [son_monk_candidate.GetFirstName]. [son_monk_candidate.GetSheHeCap] will become a member of the [son_holyorder_host.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName], taking up arms in defence of [Root.GetHighGodName].

To the Excellent [Root.GetTitledName],
I shall be honored to officiate [Root.GetHerHisCap] [Root.GetHonorific]'s coronation, provided that [Root.GetHerHisCap] [Root.GetHonorific] show [Root.GetHerHisCap] devotion by allowing one of [Root.GetHerHisCap] [son_holyorder_candidate.GetSonDaughter]s to do [son_holyorder_candidate.GetHerHis] part in the sacred war against the infidels by joining the [son_holyorder_host.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName].

Ever [Root.GetHerHis] [Root.GetHonorific]'s servant
[From.GetTitledName]
I will not risk my [son_holyorder_candidate.GetSonDaughter]'s life for a crown.

To the Just [Root.GetTitledName],
I shall be honored to officiate [Root.GetHerHisCap] [Root.GetHonorific]'s inauguration, provided that [Root.GetHerHisCap] [Root.GetHonorific] show [Root.GetHerHisCap] patriotism by allowing one of [Root.GetHerHisCap] [son_holyorder_candidate.GetSonDaughter]s to do [son_holyorder_candidate.GetHerHis] part in the struggle to preserve America by joining [son_holyorder_host.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName].

Sincerely,
[From.GetTitledName]

The [d_libertarian.GetBaseName] is one of the most ancient and respected Americanist orders. What started as a small group of women dedicated to preservation and protection of the Statue of Liberty, grew into its own splinter faith, diverging from the Americanist mainstream. The First Lady of the Order is overall responsible for all Libertarians, and all sanctioned Libertarian preachers are members of the Order.
Start planning the theft of the §YMarble Bust§!!
Start planning the theft of §YOld World Money§!!

Madisonians differ from mainstream Americanism in that they consider the judicary the supreme branch of the government. Legends of Justices of the Supreme Court fighting against tyrannical Presidents and Congressmen have filled them with a conviction that a Chief Justice of the Supreme Court is the superior authority on all matters spiritual and temporal.
If I am patriotic enough and control Washington, I can restore the Supreme Court to its rightful place, so that it may guide all patriots, as Madison wanted.
Restore the Supreme Court in Washington
The Chief Justice has lost control of Washington, but it is within my power to restore the Capital to him!

Rome, for centuries the center of Christendom, is in Fraticelli hands. This has given me an opportunity to create a Fraticelli Papacy, which shall do away with the scandalous display of wealth that the Catholic Papacy has long been guilty of.

Rome, for centuries the center of Christendom, is in Fraticelli hands. [From.GetTitledFirstName] has therefore seen fit to create a Fraticelly Papacy, claiming it shall do away with the scandalous display of wealth that the Catholic Papacy has long been guilty of.

I have granted Rome to its rightful ruler, so that the Fraticelli Pope may lead his Church from accommodations befitting his stature. The Pope shall soon take up his abode in the offices historically occupied by his Catholic predecessors.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has granted Rome to its rightful ruler, so that the Fraticelli Pope may lead his Church from accommodations befitting his stature. The Pope shall soon take up his abode in the offices historically occupied by his Catholic predecessors.
This judge is probably next in line for a Justiceship when one becomes available.
Of all the judges in my realm, this one is the likeliest to get appointed Justice by the Chief Justice.
The Senior Justice of the Supreme Court is the judge next in line to become Chief Justice
A war over the [Root.GetConclaveName], and what is the righteous way forward for the faith.
Impious [Root.RelHead.GetTitle] won the war for the [Root.GetConclaveName]
By not seeking legitimacy directly from the [Root.GetConclaveName], your inauguration will §ROffend§! the §Y[Root.RelHead.GetTitle]§!.
This ruler was inaugurated by a minor judge.\nA formal inauguration is considered by many a fundamental step in the legitimization of any proper [Root.Religion.GetName] [Root.GetTitle].
This ruler was inaugurated by [Root.GetCrownedByDesc].\nA formal inauguration is considered by many a fundamental step in the legitimization of any proper [Root.Religion.GetName] [Root.GetTitle].
This ruler was inaugurated by the [Root.RelHead.GetTitle].\nA formal inauguration is considered by many a fundamental step in
This President was inaugurated by [Root.GetCrownedByDesc].\nA formal inauguration is considered by many a fundamental step in the legitimization of any proper President.
Write a letter to [Root.RelHead.GetTitledFirstName], asking [Root.RelHead.GetSheHe] to inaugurate you as [Root.GetTitle].

To the Illuminating [Root.GetTitledName],
I shall be honored to officiate [Root.GetHerHisCap] [Root.GetHonorific]'s inauguration, provided that [Root.GetHerHisCap] [Root.GetHonorific] donates a sizable sum of money to [Root.RelHead.GetTitle]'s preservation efforts as a show of [Root.GetHerHisCap] devotion.

Ever [Root.GetHerHis] [Root.GetHonorific]'s servant
[From.GetTitledName]
Now that I have the [Root.RelHead.GetTitle] to officiate my inauguration, I must decide how much I wish to spend on the ceremony leading up to it.
[Root.GetTitledName] gains the trait Inaugurated by the [Root.RelHead.GetTitle]

To the Illustrious [Root.GetTitledName],
I shall be honored to officiate [Root.GetHerHisCap] [Root.GetHonorific]'s inauguration, provided that [Root.GetHerHisCap] [Root.GetHonorific] show [Root.GetHerHisCap] devotion by organizing a private feast in honor of an ardent servant of Justice such as I am.

Ever [Root.GetHerHis] [Root.GetHonorific]'s servant
[From.GetTitledName]

To the Patriotic [Root.GetTitledName],\nI shall be honored to officiate [Root.GetHerHisCap] [Root.GetHonorific]'s inauguration, provided that [Root.GetHerHisCap] [Root.GetHonorific] show [Root.GetHerHisCap] devotion by donating the [scoped_artifact.GetName] [Root.GetSheHe] holds for the good of all patriots.

To [Root.GetTitledName],
I shall be glad to conduct your inauguration, as [Root.GetHighGodName] intended - as soon as you recognize that the Judicary is no servant to any ruler, but to blind and fair Justice, equal and independent for all. 

Sincerely,
[From.GetTitledName]

To [Root.GetTitledName],
I shall be glad to conduct your inauguration, as [Root.GetHighGodName] intended - as soon as you recognize that the Order is no servant to any earthly ruler, but to our illustrious Lady.

Sincerely,
[From.GetTitledName]
[Root.RelHead.GetTitle] or not, you are still my vassal.

To [Root.GetTitledName],
I shall be glad to conduct your inauguration, as soon as you make a one-time increase to the budget of the Judicary. 

Sincerely,
[From.GetTitledName]

To [Root.GetTitledName],
I shall be glad to conduct your inauguration, as soon as you make a donation to the Order of Our Lady Liberty. 

Sincerely,
[From.GetTitledName]

To [Root.GetTitledName],
I shall be glad to conduct your inauguration, as soon as you officially proclaim that it is no business of the [Root.GetTitle] to appoint members of the judicary. 

Sincerely,
[From.GetTitledName]

To [Root.GetTitledName],
I shall be glad to conduct your inauguration, as soon as you prove your devotion to [From.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap] by waging war against a most criminal ruler whose wickedness made worthy of official censure. 

Sincerely,
[From.GetTitledName]

To [Root.GetTitledName],
I shall be glad to conduct your inauguration, but first, let us celebrate this joyous occasion with a lavish feast. 

Sincerely,
[From.GetTitledName]

[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] made good use of my money: the mansion in [FromFrom.Location.GetName] has been filled to the brim with wine and whores. Soon after the start of the celebration for my upcoming coronation, the crowd of lechers and drunks invited to the party are already debasing themselves in the most abominable acts imaginable.

When my guards come to recover me in the morning, I barely remember anything of what has happened last night. I am fairly certain to remember, amongst other things, seeing [coronation_priest.GetTitledFirstName] crown me on top of a fountain of wine, as naked as on the day [coronation_priest.GetSheHe] was born.

Militarism is a splinter Americanist movement that formed as a consequence of the death of President Wyatt Kelleher at the hands of the Deitsch. Finding inspiration in the legends of America's ancient heroes, the United States Military, the Militarists have denounced the Post-Event Presidency as a pathetic farce, and sworn that they shall one day reunite America, by fire and sword if need be.
With some of the most important holy sites of the Militarist faith now under my direct control the time has come to bring order back to America by restoring the Army Forces Command

Since the humiliating defeat and death of President Kelleher at the hands of the Deitsch the Militarist faithful have shunned the Post-Event Presidency, which in turn, earned them the ire of the Americanist faith. However, times have changed and now it is the "true" Americanists that find themselves outnumbered and outgunned, as from humble beginnings [Root.GetFullName] has not only managed to extend the reach of the Militarist faith but has also united a vast majority of the faithful under [Root.GetHerselfHimself] banner. Sensing an opportunity, [Root.GetFullName] has proclaimed [Root.GetHerselfHimself] the "General Of The Army" and has laid claim to all of America, from sea to shining sea...
Hannibal Barron restored the Presidency a decade after its destruction by the Deitsch, he would go on to threaten the Holy Columbian Confederacy before being assassinated.
